sys_ux_client_script.name: handle_pagination

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_6b2effe2ab29a110cdd4d95a4fd0e784
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="">e72effe2e829a11016a03748ff1ba384</macroponent><name>handle_pagination</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
	const props = api.context.props;
	const fields = {
		searchContextConfigId: props.searchContextConfigId,
		searchTerm: props.searchTerm
	};
	const token = event.payload.paginationToken;
	const params = {
		searchFilters: props.searchFilters,
		facetFilters: props.facetFilters,
		disableSpellCheck: props.disableSpellCheck,
		paginationToken: token
	};
	global.window.scrollTo(0, 0);
	helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-16 14:34:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>6b2effe2ab29a110cdd4d95a4fd0e784</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_pagination</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_6b2effe2ab29a110cdd4d95a4fd0e784</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-16 14:34:57</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
